sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Commemorative Medallions Act.

sections.heading: Issuance of commemorative medallions.
sections.text:
The State Treasurer may
issue medallions to commemorate popular contemporaneous events of Statewide
interest.

sections.heading: Selection of events to be commemorated.
sections.text:
The General Assembly
shall select the
events to be commemorated by joint resolution adopted by the affirmative vote
of at least
three-fifths of the members elected to each house.
The State Treasurer may recommend a limit
of the number of series of medallions to be issued in a
calendar year by giving notice of the recommended limitation to the General
Assembly before
December 1 of the preceding calendar year.

sections.heading: Rules.
sections.text:
The State Treasurer may promulgate rules to implement
this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
